product_name: adidas Hiking 1-Side Fleece Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Brushed on the inside and smooth on the outside, the adidas Hiking 1-Side Fleece Hoodie for women keeps you cozy and warm around town or on outdoor hikes and treks. Climawarm(TM) thermal fleece offers superb insulation, especially under a shell. Adjustable hood seals in warmth. Cuff thumb loops extend coverage over hands. Overstock.
short_description: Brushed on the inside and smooth on the outside, the adidas Hiking 1-Side Fleece Hoodie for women keeps you cozy and warm around town or on outdoor hikes and treks.
